pr_title: [extension-selenium] Add step to check element existence for duration

timeline.message: [extension-selenium] Add step to check element existence for duration
[extension-selenium] Add step to check element existence for duration

timeline.bodyText: Then element located `$locator` exists for `$duration` duration
timeline.author: valfirst
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -59,6 +66,22 @@ public void waitForElementDisappearance(Locator locator) waitForCondition(expectedSearchActionsConditions.invisibilityOfElement(locator)); } + /** + * Checks that element located by locator exists during the duration + * @param locator locator to find an element + * @param duration total waiting time according to ISO 8601 + * standard + */ + @Then("element located '$locator' exists for '$duration' duration")

timeline.bodyText: is there any way to pretty-print duration?
timeline.author: valfirst
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -59,6 +66,22 @@ public void waitForElementDisappearance(Locator locator) waitForCondition(expectedSearchActionsConditions.invisibilityOfElement(locator)); } + /** + * Checks that element located by locator exists during the duration + * @param locator locator to find an element + * @param duration total waiting time according to ISO 8601 + * standard + */ + @Then("element located '$locator' exists for '$duration' duration") + public void doesElementByLocatorExistsForDuration(Locator locator, Duration duration) + { + WaitResult result = waitActions.wait(uiContext.getSearchContext(), duration, + expectedSearchActionsConditions + .not(expectedSearchActionsConditions.presenceOfAllElementsLocatedBy(locator)), false); + softAssert.assertFalse(String.format("Element located by locator '%s' has existed during '%s' duration", + locator, duration.toSeconds()), result.isWaitPassed());

timeline.bodyText: I believe we should revise org.vividus.ui.action.search.Locator#toString as first
timeline.author: valfirst

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/vividus-extension-selenium/src/test/java/org/vividus/bdd/steps/ui/GenericWaitStepsTests.java b/vividus-extension-selenium/src/test/java/org/vividus/bdd/steps/ui/GenericWaitStepsTests.java

@@ -83,8 +87,14 @@ class GenericWaitStepsTests

-    @Test
-    void testElementByLocatorExistsForDuration()

+        "2000   , 2 seconds",
+        "73     , 73 millis",
+        "3034159, 3034 seconds 159 millis"
+    })
+    @ParameterizedTest
+    void shouldCheckThatElementByLocatorExistsForDuration(long millis, String assertDuration)
     {
         Locator locator = new Locator(TestLocatorType.SEARCH, VALUE);
         IExpectedSearchContextCondition<List<WebElement>> presenceOfAllElements = mock(
